definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to appear/to arise/to emerge/to show up
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
to show/to show off/to display/to manifest/expression/manifestation/show/display/performance (at work etc)/behavior
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate

sentences.english: “We have done this every June for nineteen years, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 每年逢六月，我們這樣做，現已經有十九年了。

sentences.english: Now his focus is the research of "Activity Results of 'Vitalization of Elders'".
sentences.chinese: 現着重於“‘激活老年人’的活動效果”研究。

sentences.english: In 771 B. C, the capital was moved eastward to Luoyang in present-day Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 公元前771年，周的首都東遷到了現河南省的洛陽。

sentences.english: He is the highest ranking White House official convicted of felony in years.
sentences.chinese: 他是現白宮高級官員這些年被判重刑最嚴重的人員。

sentences.english: Primary coverage of urban water distribution system is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 現介紹了城市給水系統優化調度的主要內容。

sentences.english: Tana was just a puppy when doctors noticed she had testicles.
sentences.chinese: 當醫生髮現Tana長了睾丸時，她還只是只小狗。

sentences.english: Mr. Jiang is currently Managing Director of the Investment Banking Department.
sentences.chinese: 蔣興權先生現爲中金公司投資銀行部董事總經理。

sentences.english: John got sick last January and has been in bed since then.
sentences.chinese: 約翰於去年一月染疾，現仍臥病不起。

sentences.english: We must also discover "others" and the intersubjective world.
sentences.chinese: 我們必鬚髮現“他者”和主體間性的世界。

sentences.english: Shandong Provincial Hospital now has 74 clinical and medical science departments.
sentences.chinese: 山東省立醫院現設有74個臨牀和醫技科室。

sentences.english: The optimal management of femoral fractures in adolescents is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 對於青少年股骨骨折的最佳治療現仍存在爭議。

sentences.english: Automotive engineering is subordinated in school-level key disciplines.
sentences.chinese: 本專業所依託的學科現爲大學校級重點學科。

sentences.english: In addition, tour lines to India have been stopped.
sentences.chinese: 此外，各旅行社現也已叫停了前往印度的各條旅遊線。

sentences.english: Presently bestselling inside and out of province, sells in distant markets of Macao, soon infiltrates the international market.
sentences.chinese: 現暢銷省內外，遠銷澳門，即將打入國際市場。

sentences.english: The student found it difficult to learn the subjunctive mood of English.
sentences.chinese: 這個學生髮現英語的虛擬語氣很難學。

sentences.english: She graduated with Master degree in major vocal pedagogy from Northeaster Illinois University in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 現獲得東北伊利諾州立大學聲樂教學法碩士學位。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
